data.title: 2024 Nu Sentral: Latest Parking Rates and Guide
data.meta_description: Latest 2024 daily parking rates, guides, and FAQ for Nu Sentral in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
data.meta_site_name: Kuala Lumpur Insider | Kuala Lumpur Insider is the number one site for all things about this great city
data.text:
Nu Sentral is the most transport friendly shopping mall in Kuala Lumpur with its close vicinity to KL Sentral – Kuala Lumpur’s biggest transportation hub. Not only that, it boasts an array of local and international brands in food, fashion, and entertainment.

Table of Content

Nu Sentral Parking Guide and Directions

Nu Sentral has more than 1,900 parking bays. There are 2 main parking entrances

Nu Sentral Car Park Zone A (Front of mall): https://waze.com/ul/hw283cfqsp

Nu Sentral Car Park Zone B (Back of mall): https://waze.com/ul/hw283cfw9m

FAQs

1. What is the maximum parking rate per day at Nu Sentral?

There is no maximum parking rate at Nu Sentral except for weekends on the condition that you spend RM50 on a single receipt on the same day at any shop in Nu Sentral
